title: runtime: crash with unexpected fault address 0xc82... on go1.5beta1
body:
With go version go1.5beta1 on linux/amd64, I see the following crash in an http server that serves short-lived requests. The process is stable with go1.4.1. (@rsc)

I'll be able to try running with GODEBUG=gccheckmark=1 early next week, but here's what I have for now:
